2    | $Header: v_video.h Fri 11-10-2000 9:47:34 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | /*--- Avoid multiple inclusion  */
6    | #ifndef _V_VIDEO_H_
7    | #define _V_VIDEO_H_
8    | 
9    | #ifndef BYTE
10   | #define BYTE unsigned char
11   | #endif 
12   | 
13   | #ifndef FALSE
14   | #  define FALSE 0
15   | #  define TRUE  !FALSE
16   | #endif
17   | 
18   | #ifndef	ERR
19   | #  define	 ERR	0		/* general error flag	 */
20   | #endif
21   | #ifndef	OK
22   | #  define	 OK	1		 	/* general OK flag	 */
23   | #endif
24   | 
25   | 
26   | #ifndef max
27   | #define max(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
28   | #endif
29   | #ifndef min
30   | #define min(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
31   | #endif
32   | 
33   | typedef unsigned char bool;		/*+ Boolean type	+*/
34   | 
35   | #define CHTYPE_LONG
36   | #ifdef CHTYPE_LONG
37   | typedef unsigned long chtype;	/* 16-bit attr + 16-bit char	*/
38   | #else
39   | typedef unsigned short chtype;	/* 8-bit attr + 8-bit char	*/
40   | #endif
41   | 
42   | 
43   | /* Monitor (terminal) type information */
44   | #define _NONE           0x00
45   | #define _MDA            0x01
46   | #define _CGA            0x02
47   | #define _EGACOLOR       0x04
48   | #define _EGAMONO        0x05
49   | #define _VGACOLOR       0x07
50   | #define _VGAMONO        0x08
51   | #define _MCGACOLOR      0x0a
52   | #define _MCGAMONO       0x0b
53   | #define _FLEXOS         0x20            /* A Flexos console */
54   | #define _MDS_GENIUS     0x30
55   | #define _UNIX_COLOR     0x40
56   | #define _UNIX_MONO      0x41
57   | 
58   | /* Text-mode font size information */
59   | #define _FONT8  8
60   | #define _FONT14 14
61   | #define _FONT15 15              /* GENIUS */
62   | #define _FONT16 16
63   | 
64   | typedef struct
65   | {
66   |     bool    alive;          /* TRUE if already opened.      */
67   |     bool    autocr;         /* if lf -> crlf            */
68   |     bool    cbreak;         /* if terminal unbuffered       */
69   |     bool    echo;           /* if terminal echo         */
70   |     bool    raw_inp;        /* raw input mode (v. cooked input) */
71   |     bool    raw_out;        /* raw output mode (7 v. 8 bits)    */
72   |     bool    refrbrk;        /* if premature refresh brk allowed */
73   |     bool    orgcbr;         /* original MSDOS ^-BREAK setting   */
74   |     bool    visible_cursor; /* TRUE if cursor is visible        */
75   |     bool    audible;        /* FALSE if the bell is visual      */
76   |     bool    full_redraw;    /* TRUE for bad performance     */
77   |     bool    direct_video;   /* Allow Direct Screen Memory writes*/
78   |     bool    mono;           /* TRUE if current screen is mono.  */
79   |     bool    sizeable;       /* TRUE if adapter is resizeable.   */
80   |     bool    bogus_adapter;  /* TRUE if adapter has insane values*/
81   |     bool    shell;          /* TRUE if reset_prog_mode() needs to be called */
82   |     chtype  blank;          /* Background character         */
83   |     chtype  orig_attr;      /* Original screen attributes       */
84   |     int cursrow;            /* position of physical cursor      */
85   |     int curscol;            /* position of physical cursor      */
86   |     int cursor;             /* Current Cursor definition        */
87   |     int visibility;         /* Visibility of cursor */
88   |     int video_page;         /* Current PC video page        */
89   |     int orig_emulation;     /* Original cursor emulation value  */
90   |     int orig_cursor;        /* Original cursor size         */
91   |     int font;               /* default font size            */
92   |     int orig_font;          /* Original font size           */
93   |     int lines;              /* New value for LINES          */
94   |     int cols;               /* New value for COLS           */
95   |     int emalloc;            /* 0x0C0C if initscr() is to reset  */
96   |                             /*     this value to TRUE;      */
97   |                             /* TRUE only if emalloc()/ecalloc() */
98   |                             /*     are is to be used;       */
99   |                             /* FALSE if malloc()/calloc() are   */
100  |                             /*     to be used.          */
101  |     int scrnmode;           /* default screen mode          */
102  |     int adapter;            /* Screen type              */
103  |     unsigned video_seg;     /* video base segment           */
104  |     unsigned video_ofs;     /* video base offset            */
105  | }   SCREEN;
106  | 
107  | typedef struct _win		/* definition of a window.	   */
108  | {
109  | 	int	_cury;		/* current pseudo-cursor	   */
110  | 	int	_curx;
111  | 	int	_maxy;		/* max window coordinates	   */
112  | 	int	_maxx;
113  | 	int	_pmaxy;		/* max physical size		   */
114  | 	int	_pmaxx;
115  | 	int	_begy;		/* origin on screen		   */
116  | 	int	_begx;
117  | 	int	_lastpy;	/* last y coordinate of upper left pad display area */
118  | 	int	_lastpx;	/* last x coordinate of upper left pad display area */
119  | 	int	_lastsy1;	/* last upper y coordinate of screen window for pad */
120  | 	int	_lastsx1;	/* last upper x coordinate of screen window for pad */
121  | 	int	_lastsy2;	/* last lower y coordinate of screen window for pad */
122  | 	int	_lastsx2;	/* last lower x coordinate of screen window for pad */
123  | 	int	_flags;		/* window properties		   */
124  | 	chtype	_attrs;		/* standard A_STANDOUT attributes and colors  */
125  | 	chtype	_bkgd;		/* wrs(4/6/93) background, normally blank */
126  | 	int	_tabsize;	/* tab character size		   */
127  | 	bool	_clear;		/* causes clear at next refresh	   */
128  | 	bool	_leave;		/* leaves cursor as it happens	   */
129  | 	bool	_scroll;	/* allows window scrolling	   */
130  | 	bool	_nodelay;	/* input character wait flag	   */
131  | 	bool	_immed;	/* immediate update flag	   */
132  | 	bool	_use_keypad;	/* flags keypad key mode active	   */
133  | 	bool	_use_idl;	/* True if Ins/Del line can be used*/
134  | 	bool	_use_idc;	/* True if Ins/Del character can be used*/
135  | 	chtype**_y;		/* pointer to line pointer array   */
136  | 	int*	_firstch;	/* first changed character in line */
137  | 	int*	_lastch;	/* last changed character in line  */
138  | 	int	_tmarg;	/* top of scrolling region	   */
139  | 	int	_bmarg;	/* bottom of scrolling region	   */
140  | 	char*	_title;		/* window title			   */
141  | 	char	_title_ofs;	/* window title offset from left   */
142  | 	chtype	_title_attr;	/* window title attributes	   */
143  | 	chtype	_blank;		/* window's blank character	   */
144  | 	int	_parx, _pary;	/* coords relative to parent (0,0) */
145  | struct	_win*	_parent;	/* subwin's pointer to parent win  */
146  | }	WINDOW;
147  |

150  | /*+ v_adapt.c +*/
151  | int v_query_adapter_type();
152  | int	v_sanity_check(int adapter);
153  | unsigned char getdosmembyte (int offset);
154  | unsigned short getdosmemword (int offset);
155  | void setdosmembyte (int offset, unsigned char b);
156  | void setdosmemword (int offset, unsigned short w);
157  | 
158  | /*+ v_curs.c +*/
159  | void   v_cursoroff(void);
160  | void   v_cursoron(void);
161  | int    v_get_cursor_mode(void);
162  | void   v_getcurpos(int *row, int *col);
163  | int    v_gotoxy(int row, int col);
164  | 
165  | /*+ v_font.c +*/
166  | int	   v_get_font(void);
167  | int	   v_get_rows(void);
168  | int    v_set_font(int size);
169  | int    v_set_80x25(void);
170  | 
171  | /*+ v_init.c +*/
172  | WINDOW* initscr(void);
173  | int endwin(void);
174  | int resize_screen(int nlines);
